mapper.select: SELECT A.*, @rownum := @rownum+1 AS reNum FROM ( SELECT re_id, re_contents, re_md_name, re_create_date, re_star FROM review as rv LEFT JOIN tblhealthcenter as hc ON rv.re_md_addr = hc.medical_addr JOIN (SELECT @rownum := 0) AS R WHERE hc.idx = #{idx} ORDER BY rv.re_create_date DESC) AS A
